title: StarkNet Alpha 2 – New Phase: Composability
short_desc: StarkNet is a permissionless decentralized Validity-Rollup (aka a “ZK-Rollup”). We announced its roadmap at the beginning of the year. The Alpha, currently running on a public Ethereum testnet, already supports permissionless deployment of smart contracts implementing any business logic, with L1<>L2 messaging and on-chain data.
